meanings.definition: A type of silk fabric made from irregularly thick yarns.
meanings.sent1: The douppioni had a unique texture due to its thick yarns.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful douppioni dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The douppioni fabric was so thick, it could almost stand on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her douppioni scarf was a bold statement piece.
meanings.sent5: The douppioni material shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A fabric made from silk fibers that have been reeled from double cocoons.
meanings.sent1: The douppioni was soft and luxurious against her skin.
meanings.sent2: They used douppioni to create elegant evening gowns.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the douppioni fabric was like wearing a cozy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The douppioni curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The bride's gown made of douppioni silk was absolutely stunning.
